name: Soulworker
description:
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ“The world will be reborn under fear and despair”
ㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤㅤ-Unknown, Rosca Year 9999 –
 
Chosen by the ancient god Rosca, SoulWorkers came down to save the world from darkness.
SoulWorkers use extreme emotions such as revenge, madness, and sorrow to power their individualized abilities to protect the world.


Join now and save the world in the name of a SoulWorker.

Main Characters

BOSS

  • Unique fighting styles allowing you to play with your personalized skill combinations.
  • Scenic background animations help your SoulWorker come to life
  • Fascinating storylines in a dark post-apocalyptic scene
  • Large PvE contents with more than 100+ dungeons
